page.title: 14WINFORD CEVC PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {There are 64 children at Winford {Primary School. There are{3 classes}in the school. In{class 1}there are 16{infants, in{class 2}there are 20{lower juniors and in{class 3}there are 28{top {juniors. Mrs. Harris takes class 1 and she is also the{Deputy Head.}She is responsible for the{Maths and Computer and{Outdoor Pursuits. Miss Sherratt takes class 2 and she is a teacher on a{Scale 1 Post.}She is responsible for{Music and Media {Studies. Mrs. Wilson takes class 3 and she is the{Headteacher.}She is responsible for{Language Development, Library and {Resources. Mrs. Sellars is the {General Assistant and is a trained{Nursery Nurse. Mrs. Pearce is the{Clerical Assistant.
